body.code: #! paste("Hello world, this is", R.version.string, "and it's", date(), "!")
body.p: Figure captions should be translated to/from the RMarkdown fig.caption option:
body.code: #! fig.width=7,fig.height=6,fig.cap="Figure caption" hist(rnorm(min(1000, 1e5)), breaks=40, col=hsv(0.6, 0.9, 1), xlab="Value", main="")
